data.title: A Site Nebula Door and Heaven Execute + Pull
data.description: Here is the standard combination of stars you can use to execute the A Site. The Gravity Well towards Heaven is a great way to make it difficult for rotating Defenders to assist their teammates easily on site. You may also use the Gravity Well behind Generator or Green Box.

data.title: Default Lurk / Control For A Main Nebula
data.description: Keep Defenders guessing, or simply force them to use utility to gain information towards A Main, with this default Nebula. This allows you to also play in Wine if you choose to cross over.

data.title: Standard B Site Execute Nebula Smokes + Stairs Pull
data.description: Here are the default smokes for a B Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.
